entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
